titles.title: Lord, Thy love has sought and found us

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He is speaking to His Father, Tasting deep that bitter cup, Yet He takes it, willing rather For our sakes to drink it up. Oh, what love! He loved me! Gave Himself, my soul, for thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then that closing scene of anguish: All God’s waves and billows roll Over Him, there left to languish On the cross, to save my soul. Matchless love! how vast, how free, Jesus gave Himself for me.{/lang-eng}
